channel.title: Crash on close in windowed mode
channel.description:
#### What happened? When playing in windowed mode, if you click the close button, rather than the quit button, the game crashes and steam says the game is running. Then I am required to restart my computer to be able to start the game again.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I would assume the game should be able to be exited using the close button without the game crashing.
#### Steps to reproduce: Windowed mode, use close button (x in top right corner).
#### Comments: Not game breaking, not urgent. Just a slight annoyance.
